text: "From the Bottom of My Broken Heart" is a song released off of Britney Spears' first studio album ...Baby One More Time. It was released as a single in December 1999 in the United States, Latin America, and Oceania. It reached the top 10 of the Billboard Hot 100 in the year 2000. Category:1999 songs Category:Britney Spears songs
title: From the Bottom of My Broken Heart
